native_answer: Quand nous sommes arrivés, elle était déjà partie en voyage.
prompt: By the time we arrived, she ______ on a trip.
answer: By the time we arrived, she had already left on a trip.
audio_dir: By the time we arrived, she had already left on a trip.

native_answer: Tu avais demandé des directions avant de te perdre.
prompt: You (singular) ______ for directions before getting lost.
answer: You (singular) had asked for directions before getting lost.
audio_dir: You (singular) had asked for directions before getting lost.

native_answer: Ils avaient téléphoné plusieurs fois avant de se rencontrer en personne.
prompt: They ______ on the phone several times before meeting in person.
answer: They had called on the phone several times before meeting in person.
audio_dir: They had called on the phone several times before meeting in person.

native_answer: Ils étaient arrivés à la conclusion qu'ils avaient tort avant de s'excuser.
prompt: They ______ to the conclusion that they were wrong before they apologized.
answer: They had come to the conclusion that they were wrong before they apologized.
audio_dir: They had come to the conclusion that they were wrong before they apologized.

native_answer: J'avais détesté la nouvelle politique avant qu'elle ne soit même mise en œuvre.
prompt: I ______ the new policy before it was even implemented.
answer: I had disliked the new policy before it was even implemented.
audio_dir: I had disliked the new policy before it was even implemented.

native_answer: J'avais senti que l'eau était trop froide avant de décider de ne pas nager.
prompt: I ______ the water was too cold before deciding not to swim.
answer: I had felt the water was too cold before deciding not to swim.
audio_dir: I had felt the water was too cold before deciding not to swim.

native_answer: J'avais oublié mes clés à la maison avant de m'en rendre compte au travail.
prompt: I ______ my keys at home before realizing it at work.
answer: I had forgotten my keys at home before realizing it at work.
audio_dir: I had forgotten my keys at home before realizing it at work.

native_answer: Il avait offert un cadeau à chacun de ses collègues avant de quitter le bureau.
prompt: He ______ a gift to each of his colleagues before leaving the office.
answer: He had given a gift to each of his colleagues before leaving the office.
audio_dir: He had given a gift to each of his colleagues before leaving the office.

native_answer: Il était allé avec elle chez le médecin avant qu'elle ne demande à quelqu'un d'autre.
prompt: He ______ with her to the doctor before she asked for anyone else.
answer: He had gone with her to the doctor before she asked for anyone else.
audio_dir: He had gone with her to the doctor before she asked for anyone else.

native_answer: Vous aviez reçu un cadeau avant qu'il ne pense même à lui en acheter un.
prompt: You (plural) ______ a gift before he even thought to buy her one.
answer: You (plural) had gotten a gift before he even thought to buy her one.
audio_dir: You (plural) had gotten a gift before he even thought to buy her one.

native_answer: Vous aviez détesté le goût du brocoli avant d'apprendre à le cuisiner correctement.
prompt: You (plural) ______ the taste of broccoli before you learned how to cook it properly.
answer: You (plural) had hated the taste of broccoli before you learned how to cook it properly.
audio_dir: You (plural) had hated the taste of broccoli before you learned how to cook it properly.

native_answer: Ils s'étaient aidés de nombreuses fois avant que le projet ne soit terminé.
prompt: They ______ each other many times before the project was finished.
answer: They had helped each other many times before the project was finished.
audio_dir: They had helped each other many times before the project was finished.

native_answer: Elle avait su pour la fête surprise depuis des semaines avant que cela n'arrive.
prompt: She ______ about the surprise party for weeks before it happened.
answer: She had known about the surprise party for weeks before it happened.
audio_dir: She had known about the surprise party for weeks before it happened.

native_answer: Nous avions appris les bases de la langue avant notre voyage.
prompt: We ______ the basics of the language before our trip.
answer: We had learned the basics of the language before our trip.
audio_dir: We had learned the basics of the language before our trip.

native_answer: Elle avait aimé la publication avant qu'elle ne devienne virale.
prompt: She ______ the post before it went viral.
answer: She had liked the post before it went viral.
audio_dir: She had liked the post before it went viral.

native_answer: Il avait aimé la musique depuis qu'il était enfant.
prompt: He ______ music since he was a child.
answer: He had loved music since he was a child.
audio_dir: He had loved music since he was a child.

native_answer: Nous nous étions aimés profondément avant le malentendu.
prompt: We ______ each other deeply before the misunderstanding.
answer: We had loved each other deeply before the misunderstanding.
audio_dir: We had loved each other deeply before the misunderstanding.

native_answer: Ils avaient eu besoin d'aide pour le projet avant que leurs amis n'offrent leur assistance.
prompt: They ______ help with the project before their friends offered assistance.
answer: They had needed help with the project before their friends offered assistance.
audio_dir: They had needed help with the project before their friends offered assistance.

native_answer: J'avais joué du piano magnifiquement avant que les invités n'arrivent.
prompt: I ______ the piano beautifully before the guests arrived.
answer: I had played the piano beautifully before the guests arrived.
audio_dir: I had played the piano beautifully before the guests arrived.

native_answer: Tu avais mis les restes au réfrigérateur avant d'aller te coucher.
prompt: You (singular) ______ the leftovers in the refrigerator before going to bed.
answer: You (singular) had put the leftovers in the refrigerator before going to bed.
audio_dir: You (singular) had put the leftovers in the refrigerator before going to bed.

native_answer: Il avait pris une friandise du bocal avant que quelqu'un ne s'en aperçoive.
prompt: He ______ a treat from the jar before anyone noticed.
answer: He had taken a treat from the jar before anyone noticed.
audio_dir: He had taken a treat from the jar before anyone noticed.

native_answer: Elle avait enseigné le codage à de nombreux étudiants avant de rejoindre l'entreprise.
prompt: She ______ coding to many students before joining the company.
answer: She had taught coding to many students before joining the company.
audio_dir: She had taught coding to many students before joining the company.

native_answer: Il avait pensé aux conséquences avant de prendre sa décision.
prompt: He ______ about the consequences before making his decision.
answer: He had thought about the consequences before making his decision.
audio_dir: He had thought about the consequences before making his decision.

native_answer: Leurs doigts s'étaient touchés pendant un bref moment, créant un souvenir inoubliable.
prompt: Their fingers ______ for a brief moment, creating an unforgettable memory.
answer: Their fingers had touched for a brief moment, creating an unforgettable memory.
audio_dir: Their fingers had touched for a brief moment, creating an unforgettable memory.

native_answer: Nous avions essayé de surfer quelques fois avant de finalement réussir.
prompt: We ______ surfing a few times before we finally succeeded.
answer: We had tried surfing a few times before we finally succeeded.
audio_dir: We had tried surfing a few times before we finally succeeded.

native_answer: Vous aviez compris le concept complètement avant le test.
prompt: You (plural) ______ the concept fully before the test.
answer: You (plural) had understood the concept fully before the test.
audio_dir: You (plural) had understood the concept fully before the test.

native_answer: Elle avait utilisé un outil pour résoudre le problème avant que le technicien n'arrive.
prompt: She ______ a tool to fix the problem before the technician arrived.
answer: She had used a tool to fix the problem before the technician arrived.
audio_dir: She had used a tool to fix the problem before the technician arrived.

native_answer: Nous avions voulu voyager dans le monde entier avant de nous installer.
prompt: We ______ to travel the world before we settled down.

audio_dir: We had wanted to travel the world before we settled down.
